generated_body: If you click on the article titled "Taylor Swift Rep Hits Back at Big Machine, Claims She's Actually Owed $7.9 Million in Unpaid Royalties," you can expect to read about the ongoing dispute between Taylor Swift and her former record label, Big Machine.
